name: Rise of the Fallen
description:
RISE OF THE FALLEN

"You're a soldier, awoke to remnants of a war long past.. Recover the secrets of the battlefield in which you used to call "home" and discover the truth of what really started the 100 year long war."

--CONTROLS--

(Controller Supported)

WASD / Arrow Keys / D Pad -> Move

SPACE / W / Up Arrow / Bottom Button -> Jump

J / Left Button -> Shoot

This game was made for the Metroidvania Month Jam and was made in it's entirety in a month. What you see here is just a vertical slice of what could be a full game,  and a testing of the waters of  what goes in to designing a metroidvania.  This is my second game that I completed using the Unity game engine, and as you can see, is a little bit rough around the edges in some areas. I tried to complete as much as I can with the given time frame,  so I hope you enjoy my 1 month of work! Constructive criticisms of course, are always appreciated, and if you want to, you can follow me on itch to see what other projects I might have in store *wink wink*
